title: CoinFlask
description: I conceptualized and developed a comprehensive website and employee portal for King Of Budz in Monroe, Michigan. Includes a employee portal that fetches sales data.

title: CoinFlask
description: CoinFlask is a rudimentary version of CoinGecko.com that provides cryptocurrency market information of the top 100 coins in real-time and preserves state.

title: Cosmic Caps NFT Collection
description: Cosmic Caps is a NFT collection of 10k 3D rendered mushrooms created using an algorithm in Blender. This collection is currently live on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: BlockForge NFT P2E Game
description: Blockforge is a Ethereum based Play-To-Earn metaverse built on Minecraft. The server has integrated NFTs that enable users to earn $FORGE tokens while playing on the server.

title: Gegoo, Inc.
description: Gegoo was a brand awareness and promotional web application built by my company, Mod Technologies LLC. Gegoo was a startup located in Dearborn, MI.

title: ATPlaque
description: ATPlaque is a U.S. Injection Molding and Rapid Manufacturing Company in Livonia, MI. I developed a six page customer facing website for ATPlaque in 2019.

title: ERC721 Data Collection Tool
description: This repository queries the Ethereum blockchain for user defined ERC721 contracts events of specific tokens IDs. The data is added to a Mongo database and can be queried to my frontend.

title: Web3Modal-Vue Implementation Tutorial
description: I created a tutorial on how to implement Web3Modal and Vuex into a VueJS application. Web3Modal is a library that supports multiple web3 wallet providers.
